languages.text: Архонт с легкостью расправляется с убийцами, и, сбросив маску, решает "размяться". Колония тонет в крови, пока друкари не насыщает свою жажду. Уйдя, она оставляет ценные ксено-дары, сложив из трупов благодарственное послание.

The Archon easily dispatches the assassins, unmasks herself, and decides to "let her hair down" a little. The colony drowns in blood until the Drukhari's thirst is quenched. She departs, leaving behind valuable gifts of xenos origin and a slew of dead bodies arranged into a message of thanks.
languages.original_text: Архонт с легкостью расправляется с убийцами, и, сбросив маску, решает "размяться". Колония тонет в крови, пока друкари не насыщает свою жажду. Уйдя, она оставляет ценные ксено-дары, сложив из трупов благодарственное послание.

traits.locale_text: The Archon easily dispatches the assassins, unmasks herself, and decides to stretch her legs. The colony drowns in blood until the Drukhari's thirst is quenched. She departs, leaving behind valuable gifts of xenos origin and a slew of dead bodies arranged into a message of thanks.

The Archon easily dispatches the assassins, unmasks herself, and decides to "let her hair down" a little. The colony drowns in blood until the Drukhari's thirst is quenched. She departs, leaving behind valuable gifts of xenos origin and a slew of dead bodies arranged into a message of thanks.

languages.text: La Arconte se deshace con facilidad de los asesinos, revela su naturaleza y decide «dejarse llevar» un poco. La colonia se inunda de sangre hasta que la Drukhari se siente satisfecha. Se marcha, dejando valiosos regalos de origen xenos y una pila de cadáveres colocados para formar un mensaje de agradecimiento.
languages.original_text: The Archon easily dispatches the assassins, unmasks herself, and decides to "let her hair down" a little. The colony drowns in blood until the Drukhari's thirst is quenched. She departs, leaving behind valuable gifts of xenos origin and a slew of dead bodies arranged into a message of thanks.

traits.locale_text: La Arconte se deshace con facilidad de los asesinos, revela su naturaleza y decide «dejarse llevar» un poco. La colonia se inunda de sangre hasta que la Drukhari se siente satisfecha. Se marcha, dejando valiosos regalos de origen xenos y una pila de cadáveres colocados para formar un mensaje de agradecimiento.

languages.text: アーコンはアサシンをあっさりと退け、正体を明かすと、少し「髪を下ろして」みることにした。デュカーリの渇きが癒えるまで、コロニーは血に染まる。彼女は異種族からの貴重な贈り物と、感謝のメッセージとして整えられた死体の数々を残して去っていった。
languages.original_text: The Archon easily dispatches the assassins, unmasks herself, and decides to "let her hair down" a little. The colony drowns in blood until the Drukhari's thirst is quenched. She departs, leaving behind valuable gifts of xenos origin and a slew of dead bodies arranged into a message of thanks.

traits.locale_text: アーコンはアサシンをあっさりと退け、正体を明かすと、少し「髪を下ろして」みることにした。デュカーリの渇きが癒えるまで、コロニーは血に染まる。彼女は異種族からの貴重な贈り物と、感謝のメッセージとして整えられた死体の数々を残して去っていった。

languages.text: 执政官轻轻松松地消灭了刺客，随后揭开了自己的伪装，决定“好好放松一下”。随后，整个殖民地都淹没在血海之中。当她的饥渴终于得到缓解之后，她离开了殖民地，留下了几件珍贵的异形造物作为回礼，还留下了堆积如山的尸体，这些尸体被拼成了感谢的话语。
languages.original_text: The Archon easily dispatches the assassins, unmasks herself, and decides to "let her hair down" a little. The colony drowns in blood until the Drukhari's thirst is quenched. She departs, leaving behind valuable gifts of xenos origin and a slew of dead bodies arranged into a message of thanks.

traits.locale_text: 执政官轻轻松松地消灭了刺客，随后揭开了自己的伪装，决定“好好放松一下”。随后，整个殖民地都淹没在血海之中。当她的饥渴终于得到缓解之后，她离开了殖民地，留下了几件珍贵的异形造物作为回礼，还留下了堆积如山的尸体，这些尸体被拼成了感谢的话语。

languages.text: Die Archontin selbst beseitigt die Attentäter mühelos, legt ihre Maske ab und beschließt, "ein wenig aus sich herauszugehen". Die Kolonie ertrinkt im Blut, bis der Durst der Drukhari gestillt ist. Sie verlässt die Kolonie und lässt zum Abschied wertvolle Xenos-Geschenke zurück — sowie einen ganzen Haufen von Leichen, die zu einer Dankesbotschaft arrangiert sind.
languages.original_text: The Archon easily dispatches the assassins, unmasks herself, and decides to "let her hair down" a little. The colony drowns in blood until the Drukhari's thirst is quenched. She departs, leaving behind valuable gifts of xenos origin and a slew of dead bodies arranged into a message of thanks.

traits.locale_text: Die Archontin selbst beseitigt die Attentäter mühelos, legt ihre Maske ab und beschließt, "ein wenig aus sich herauszugehen". Die Kolonie ertrinkt im Blut, bis der Durst der Drukhari gestillt ist. Sie verlässt die Kolonie und lässt zum Abschied wertvolle Xenos-Geschenke zurück — sowie einen ganzen Haufen von Leichen, die zu einer Dankesbotschaft arrangiert sind.

languages.text: L'archonte élimine les assassins en un tournemain, puis elle tombe le masque et décide de « se lâcher » un peu. La colonie se noie dans son propre sang jusqu'à ce que la Drukhari ait enfin étanché sa soif. Elle repart en laissant derrière elle de précieux cadeaux d'origine xénos et un monceau de cadavres en guise de message de remerciement.
languages.original_text: The Archon easily dispatches the assassins, unmasks herself, and decides to "let her hair down" a little. The colony drowns in blood until the Drukhari's thirst is quenched. She departs, leaving behind valuable gifts of xenos origin and a slew of dead bodies arranged into a message of thanks.
